thread.title: Justin Bieber and Louis Tomlinson take shots at each other
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber and Louis Tomlinson take shots at each other

author:
Compiled by Tony Hicks

thicks@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Justin Bieber and Louis Tomlinson take shots at each other
text:
Justin Bieber and Louis Tomlinson take shots at each other Compiled by Tony Hicks Posted: 10/02/2015 09:19:04 AM PDT Updated: 10/02/2015 09:19:30 AM PDT Justin Bieber is having an online slap fight with Louis Tomlinson of One Direction, according to E! News. 
So, like, 1D totally announced it's gonna drop a new record on Nov. 13 which is TOTALLY the same day Justin Bieber (little hearts) is releasing HIS record, OMG, lots of smiley faces, etc. 
Sorry ...that's about all the 13-year-old girl I've got. 
Anyway, the Beebs took to snapchat on Wednesday, saying, "The face you make when you come out with an album on the same day as Justin Bieber," he says, making an expression that's supposed to indicate false fear. In this Aug. 30, 2015 file photo, Justin Bieber arrives at the MTV Video Music Awards in Los Angeles. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File) 
After One Direction fans predictably threatened to mutilate him, group member Tomlinson made his own snapchat video, saying, "That face you pull when you're playing the last night at the O2," he said, with an expression indicating surprise and/or happiness. I don't know -- the Brits are strange. 
Tomlinson was referring to the band's recent sold-out, six-night run at London's big O2 Arena. 
We'll get back to you regarding this silliness when there's something equally important to report. Tony Hicks writes celebrity commentary for the Bay Area News Group. Contact him at Facebook.com/BayAreaNewsGroup.TonyHicks or Twitter.com/tonyhicks67 Advertisement
